website_summaries.verdict: A luxurious bodywash with a subtle, feminine scent that will last long after you get out of the shower.
pros: Leaves skin feeling soft and smooth
Doesn't leave a residue on your skin
cons: Formula is not as thick and sudsy as some of the others

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent and softens the skin. and of course love the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Eisenhauer

customer_reviews.title: White diamonds are a girls best friend.
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for many years. Also the body lotion, powder, and toilet spray.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Petrone

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: So glad to find this larger size. Great price, too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Malibu

customer_reviews.title: White diamonds wash
customer_reviews.text: I wear white diamonds and I love the body wash but I have A hard time finding it. It was very good that I was able to find on the Internet . I receive a lot of compliments on white diamonds
customer_reviews.author: CINDY HEATH

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has purchased White Diamonds for years, now I can enjoy the scent in a bath or shower too.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Phelps

customer_reviews.title: great value and I love the scent
customer_reviews.text: Shipping ontime, great value and I love the scent !
customer_reviews.author: Joan D.

customer_reviews.title: Great to be able to buy this product on its own and not just in a gift pack
customer_reviews.text: I have always love White Diamond products. The only thing I don’t like is stickers on the back being hard to remove
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: It makes me feel nice
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent and how it feels. I get compliments on it every time I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Carr

customer_reviews.title: Awesom
customer_reviews.text: Omg i love it a d I need more lol
customer_reviews.author: Mirella

customer_reviews.title: Love the Smell
customer_reviews.text: I love the wash, but I do wish the formula was a little thicker/richer and gave ore lather. But it's White Diamonds - I am still a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Ladymac

customer_reviews.title: White Diamonds by Eliabeth Taylor Body Wash
customer_reviews.text: White Diamonds is my favorite fragrance and the body wash is hard to find in department stores was so please to find it on Amazon and for a reasonable price too!
customer_reviews.author: realtoryvonne

customer_reviews.title: Smelled good but did not last on skin
customer_reviews.text: Body wash was thin and did not lather at all. Smelled good but did not last on skin. The only resemblance to the small body wash in the gift pack is the larger size. very dissappointing..
customer_reviews.author: Debra K. Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the very best body washes I have found for this product - it was very thick and more sudsy than previous ones, which made it last longer as we did not have to use as much of it. Excellent product quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Peeden

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I also had trouble finding this item at the dept. stores! I will buy again for sure. I use in the bath and the scent is wonderful!!! Thanks for the quick service. Tempe
customer_reviews.author: Tempe Schramm

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift-came in good shape-on time. The woman who recieve it enjoyed it very much. Would buy it again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: KMLKLL

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife. She loves it, but it is hard to find. She says, "Well worth the money!"
customer_reviews.author: Robert Meyer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: It really is what I expected. Nice and long lasting fragrance. I will def. buy it again and will recommend the product to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Terenia

customer_reviews.title: Open
customer_reviews.text: The same as before , This product had been open . I can't use this product because of that why open the box.
customer_reviews.author: lucy

customer_reviews.title: SURPRISE SURPRISE
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived on time and in good condition. I would order this product again in the future. I would also recommend this item to others.
customer_reviews.author: R. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: It is my wife's favorite.  That is good enough for me.
customer_reviews.text: The smell is very comfortable, and it makes the lady in my life happy. She is a highly trained beauty expert, runs her own business successfully. If it makes her happy, it must be the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: paulplasters

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it.
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved this scent and get lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i use this in conjunction w/ my regular body wash and a little bit goes a long way ...fantastic
customer_reviews.author: meme

customer_reviews.title: Love White Diamonds
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on earliest date announce. A classy scent. Very satisfied purchaser
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves this product, just got her some for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: bigdaddyx57

customer_reviews.title: Makes showering a Dream
customer_reviews.text: My sister gave me my first tube, and when it was almost gone I ordered a bigger one. The whole bathroom smells delicious and delightful. Just love it!
customer_reviews.author: redhatter

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: My sister will use nothing else so she loved that I remembered and gave it to her for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Reba

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: White Diamonds has always been a favorite. Service was exceptional
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn S Wick

customer_reviews.title: The opposite of stink.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my wife. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: David J Jones

customer_reviews.title: WHITE DIAMONDS  BODY WASH
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE BEEN USING WHITE DIAMONDS FOR YEARS. NOT ONLY IS IT REFRESHING BUT THE FRAGRANCE IS VERY SUBTLE AND LASTING.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B.

customer_reviews.title: body wash
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wash. It smells great and is not over powering. Also, my husband does not complain about it making his eye water as some others do. It's great and I sometimes buy it to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: alaska

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell it's not strong and it's makes me feel soft and silky doesn't dry my skin out would recommend to others and will order this again, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: KEEP IT COMING!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this in combination with the perfume since it's beginning. I wear them often and get comments about how good I smell even when I'm just walking by.
customer_reviews.author: Lona Baker

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 78 year old Aunt for Christmas (along with the perfume & lotion). She LOVES it!! It does have a very nice smell. Not to strong, not to light, just right!
customer_reviews.author: OKKathy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: mama loves it will order again price good and fast shipping ty
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: trade mark
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this products for years and everyone loves how I smell. I find that white diamonds is so refreshing. love it
customer_reviews.author: apple

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Smells really nice -- not too strong! Doesn't leave you feeling sticky either. Would definitely recommend it! Goes well with the perfume.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wirick

customer_reviews.title: Smell Great!
customer_reviews.text: Item purchased for someone else. No review available. I assume it is a good product since I was asked to order it.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: It was mediocre
customer_reviews.text: I expected more from this product .The scent us to light and not strong enough
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Sent this directly to sister as birthday gift. Arrived to her hassle free. She really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this is not an official Elizabeth Taylor. It doesn't smell very good I think it is a knock off
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Elizabeth Taylor for Women Body Wash
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased to find this product. I had searched the stores but could not find anything except sets with other items I already had. The product is very good, had a great fragrance and I will buy it again when I run out. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mawmaw

product_meta.title: White Diamonds Elizabeth Taylor Body Wash 6.8 oz
product_meta.description: White Diamonds body wash 6.8 Oz/ 200 Ml for Women by Elizabeth Taylor
feature_bullets: The packlage dimension of the product is: 5.1"L x5.1"W x3.3"H
